gcci.text: The H100's $3.15/hr pricing reflects tight supply chain constraints and premium chip scarcity, forcing enterprises to allocate significant capex for AI infrastructure while suppliers race to expand manufacturing capacity.

gtpi.text: DeepSeek's $1.25/1M token input pricing signals aggressive API price wars that are compressing margins while driving efficiency gains through model optimization and competitive pressure.

gagl.text: AI's 120 TWh annual energy load creates substantial grid strain and carbon footprint concerns, accelerating nuclear adoption discussions and renewable energy investments to meet sustainable AI growth demands.

aipi.text: The AI industry's trajectory shows unsustainable growth patterns with bubble risks emerging from inflated valuations and infrastructure overbuilding, necessitating balanced approaches to maintain long-term industry viability.
